summary.name: Secretly Group
summary.description: The Secretly Group has three independent record labels: Dead Oceans, Secretly Canadian, and Jagjaguwar. Most recently they have started working with the record label Numero Group. It was created in 1996 by Ben Swanson, Chris Swanson, Darius Van Arman, Jonathan Cargill, and later Phil Waldorf. At The Secretly group each record label has a very unique vibe to itself.

overview.name: Headquarters
overview.description: This was the founding location of the Secretly group. This is where the three record labels collide and collaborate. This headquarters is mostly corporate, organizational matters.

location.address: 213 S Rogers St suite 2, Bloomington, IN 47404

overview.name: Art Direction
overview.description: At this location they focus on directing record production, working on artists' campaigns, events, and all other necessary media. Teams work closely with artists to produce a quality art.

overview.name: Art Direction
overview.description: This location is similar to the New York Location where they will focus on collaborating and working with artists directly. They help plan out design of music videos, cover art, production, radio promotion, etc.

overview.name: Label Management
overview.description: At this location they focus on outreach in general, but also specifically to the French market. They also deal with organization.

overview.name: Marketing
overview.description: This location or office focuses on marketing and advertising the labels artists to listeners. This involves market and business strategy in order to gain more attention for their artists.

location.address: Victoria House, 64 Paul St, Shoreditch, London EC2A 4NG, United Kingdom
